entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning then changing to a few rain showers this morning and ending this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 10. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
